title: Bio-Inspired Design
description: We examine evolutionary adaptation as a source for engineering design inspiration, utilizing principles of scaling, adaptability, and robust multifunctionality that characterize biological systems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ((BIOS 1108 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1108L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1208 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1208L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or BIOL 1520 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1521 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 3160 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
